column2: # Specify the days you are interested in for post-hoc comparisons
days_of_interest <- unique(ox_mod$Day)  # You can also specify specific days manually, e.g., c(1, 5, 10, 15)
# Perform post-hoc analysis with specified days
emm_ox <- emmeans(model_ox, ~ Treatment | Day, at = list(Day = days_of_interest))
